Class Book

java.lang.Object
Book
public class Book extends Object
This class represents a book with Title, Author, Edition, and Content.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Book(String t, String a, String c, int e)
    Constructs a Book object with the specified title, author, content, and edition.

    • getPages

      public int getPages()
      Calculates the number of pages in the book based on its content. Each page have 750 chars.
      Returns:
      The number of pages in the book.
